abstract: Here's the latest batch of readers' responses to some of the shows collected through Storify.
snippet: Here's the latest batch of readers' responses to some of the shows collected through Storify.
lead_paragraph: It's Day 5 of the CMJ Music Marathon and critics from The Times aren't slowing down. @joncaramanica and @jonpareles did their best to hit the most promising shows. But we can't be everywhere. This year, we've invited readers to join us in appraising CMJ shows on Twitter.

headline.main: CMJ: Day 4 Twitter Reviews of Dum Dum Girls, Walk the Moon, Metronomy and More
